Description: Pottery ostracon, with one incised line of Coptic (?) on exterior, from the rim of a vessel, inside of rim painted black with two white circles.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell & J. Faiers
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394047) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394047)
